Conjuration 4

Summon Kusarikkus

EA Ur,  MA Uruk

Ritual
E1
spell id [id]: 271
effect number [effect_number]: 1
damage [damage]: 3068
number of effects [nreff]: 2
gems required [gemcost]: 6E
Summon Units:#3068 Kusarikku x 2
The caster summons a pair of Kusarikku, fabled Bull Men of enkidu legends. They have been revered by the enkidus since before the founding of the First City and are known to protect the Ensis and Entus, as well as the entrances to the great temple. The Kusarikku are gifted with the strength of the earth and they wield spears that halt demons in their steps.
